message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. My initial offer is $9,000 for the product.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in your product. I appreciate your offer, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're a serious buyer, and I'm willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial price. However, I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. My counteroffer is $8,500 for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer by suggesting a price of $8,200 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I still need to make a profit. My next counteroffer is $8,400 for the product. I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate to find a mutually beneficial deal.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and would like to propose a price of $8,300 for the product. I hope this is closer to what you're willing to accept.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. My next counteroffer is $8,600 for the product. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
Hello Alice, I've given your last offer some thought, and I would like to propose a price of $8,500 for the product. I hope this is a price that you can consider reasonable.

I'm starting to feel like we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to get as close to my minimum price as possible. My next counteroffer is $8,700 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope you can see the value in the product and meet me at this price.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $8,600 for the product. This is my best offer, and I hope it aligns with your valuation of the product.
